R

Recipe - Class in assn3
This class encapsulates the data of a specific bread recipe.
Recipe() - Constructor for class assn3.Recipe
This is the default constructor for Recipe.
Recipe(String, Map<String, Double>) - Constructor for class assn3.Recipe
This is the overloaded constructor to initialize a recipe with its name and ingredients.
Recipe(String, Map<String, Double>, int) - Constructor for class assn3.Recipe
This is the overloaded constructor to initialize a recipe with its name, ingredients and the quantity that has been ordered.
RecipeManager - Class in assn3
This class maintains the list of recipes and provides file I/O functionality.
RecipeManager() - Constructor for class assn3.RecipeManager
This is the default constructor for RecipeManager.
RecipeManagerTest - Class in assn3
The RecipeManagerTest class contains the main method, which serves as the entry point in the development environment.

recipeName - Variable in class assn3.Recipe
The name of the bread recipe.
recipes - Variable in class assn3.RecipeManager
The list containing all recipes loaded from the file.
